attributes.action: Cumbria council must not take Syrian refugees in light of recent events.
attributes.background:
Cumbria councils are planning on housing 30 syrian families before christmas 2015.
in light of recent events in France , Cumbria must be saved from any chance of similar attacks.
the government or cumbria council cannot guarantee they are legitimate and never will

rejection.details:
This is a decision for Cumbria Council. 

You can find out how to start a petition to the council here:

http://councilportal.cumbria.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx
